name: Namaz ka Tarika - Prayer Times for Islamic Muslim
description: Namaz ka tarika is a very useful android namaz app to learn how to perform Salah /Salat. Salah is an obligatory prayer and is part of Muslim faith, hence performing it right and according to the teaching of Islam is a key to seek Allahs mercy. The App comprises sections that cover Salat for female and male alike. It includes Farz namazain (obligatory prayers) and khaas namazain (important prayers). It is one of the best app towards learning how to perform salah with HD video and description in native urdu language. This android app is a complete guide for namaz to let the Muslim user and the newly converted know how to offer prayers five times a day. Prayers in includes:   Istikhara prayers  Funeral prayer  Jumma prayer  Eid prayer  Salattasbeeh  App features include:  Online HD video both for male and female  Namaz ka tarika in urdu language  Hanfi and shafi namaz for jurisprudence   Namaz ka tareeka with wazu (ablution)  Accurate alarm for Salah  Share videos on social platform Download this highly useful app and correct your namaz accordingly. Jazak Allah!  FOLLOW US FOR MORE UPDATES :  https://twitter.com/QuranReadingUSA  https://www.facebook.com/quranreading/  http://www.quranreading.com/
